settings.title: Rich text
settings.text: Use this section for any descriptive text you need to fill out your pages or to add introductory headings between other blocks.

settings.title: Will I be charged sales tax?
settings.text: Sales tax will be collected on all orders and will include state and municipal taxes as applicable.

settings.title: Can I cancel an order once I've placed it?
settings.text:
If the order has not shipped, the order can be cancelled for a full refund by contacting Velotric Customer Service at care@velotric.bike. If the order has shipped out from Velotric's warehouse, it will be treated as a return. You will need to contact Velotric Customer Service at care@velotric.bike to receive an RA # and further instructions.
View full details of the Velotric Online Purchase Return Policy.

settings.title: What are shipping costs?
settings.text: Free shipping includes the 48 contiguous states but not Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the other U.S. territories.

settings.title: Do you ship outside of the United States?
settings.text: Unfortunately, we don't currently offer shipping outside the United States. Free shippping includes the 48 contiguous states but not Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the other U.S. territories.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text: Visa, MasterCard, and American Express credit cards.We also offer financing through Affirm.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.text: If you find that your new Velotric bike isn't right for you, you can return it (in new, unridden condition) within 15 days for a full refund.

settings.title: Do you offer exchanges?
settings.text:
If you find that your new Velotric bike isn't right for you, you can return it (in new, unridden/unused condition) within 15 days for a full refund in accordance with our Online Purchase Return Policy.


If you are uncertain about sizing, specifications, or any concerns about the product before ordering, we strongly recommend visiting your local bike shop to get properly fitted and purchasing your bike through them. It's also the best way to help support a local business and have a place to help you in-person for anything in the future.

settings.title: Online Purchase Return Policy
settings.text: If you are not satisfied with your Velotric product you can return it, in accordance with our return policy below. To initiate a return, first contact Velotric Customer Service at care@velotric.bike to receive a Return Authorization (RA) number.

settings.title: Warranty Policy
settings.text:
Velotric stands behind all of its products.
Velotric bicycles are warranted against manufacturing defects in materials or workmanship. Velotric will repair or replace any products found to be defective within the normal scope of use with the same or most nearly comparable model or component then available. The terms of this limited warranty are described below. Learn more

settings.title: Shipping Policy
settings.text:
The total shipping time is the sum of the processing time and the shipping time.

Processing time = the time between when you place an order and when we ship it

Shipping time = the time between when your order has been shipped and delivered to you;

Shipping carrier: FedEx

Shipping time: 3-5 business days. (US continental)

Business days refer to Monday~Friday ( excluded holidays and weekends ), and the time zone is the Eastern Time Zone of USA (GMT-5).

Shipping fee: Free shipping includes the 48 contiguous states but not Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the other U.S. territories.

Shipping from: US Local warehouses

Shipping area: the US only ( Exclude Hawaii, Puerto Rico, and Alaska )

Any other question, please contact us at care@velotric.bike
